DOC.brief_title: Self-directed Titrated Transdermal Nicotine Patch Versus Standard Treatment Smoking Cessation
DOC.detailed_description: Participants recruit UOHI Smoking Cessation Clinic via medium advertisement . Following baseline assessment , participant randomly assign one two group : 1 . 10-week standard treatment transdermal nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) ; 2 . 10-week titrated transdermal nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) treatment additional NRT product ( NRT+ ) Participants assign `` NRT '' standard treatment group follow 10-week regimen nicotine patch alone . Participants assign `` NRT+ '' titrate treatment group follow 10-week regimen tailor patch dosage . Participants also provide Nicorette inhaler . All participant receive five 15-minute counselling session smoke cessation counsellor . These session occur 1 , 3 , 5 , 8 10 week post target quit date . Counselling session focus practical counselling ( problem solve skill train ) social support . During treatment phase , participant complete questionnaire measure withdrawal symptom , self-efficacy , use cessation resource Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI-II ) week 1 , 3 , 5 , 8 10 . These questionnaire also complete 26 52 week post target quit date .
